title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
November 25, 2019
H.R. 724, the “Preventing Animal Cruelty and Torture (PACT) Act,” which makes it a Federal crime to engage in animal crushing; andH.R. 2423, the “Women’s Suffrage Centennial Commemorative Coin Act,” which requires the Department of the Treasury to mint and issue coins in commemoration of the ratification of the 19th Amendment to the Constitution of the United States, giving women in the United States the right to vote.
